    • Method Detail

      • loadFromKeyStore

        @Deprecated
public static java.security.PrivateKey loadFromKeyStore(java.io.InputStream keyStream,
                                                   java.lang.String storePass,
                                                   java.lang.String alias,
                                                   java.lang.String keyPass)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                                        java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        Deprecated. (scheduled to be removed in 1.15) Use SecurityUtils#loadPrivateKeyFromKeyStore with SecurityUtils#getDefaultKeyStore() instead
        Retrieves the private key from the specified key store stream using default key store.
        Parameters:
        keyStream - input stream to the key store file (closed at the end of this method in a finally block)
        storePass - password protecting the key store file
        alias - alias under which the private key is stored
        keyPass - password protecting the private key
        Returns:
        the private key from the specified key store
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException

      • loadFromKeyStore

        @Deprecated
public static java.security.PrivateKey loadFromKeyStore(java.security.KeyStore keyStore,
                                                   java.io.InputStream keyStream,
                                                   java.lang.String storePass,
                                                   java.lang.String alias,
                                                   java.lang.String keyPass)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                                        java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        Deprecated. (scheduled to be removed in 1.15) Use SecurityUtils#loadPrivateKeyFromKeyStore instead.
        Retrieves the private key from the specified key store stream and specified key store.
        Parameters:
        keyStore - key store
        keyStream - input stream to the key store file (closed at the end of this method in a finally block)
        storePass - password protecting the key store file
        alias - alias under which the private key is stored
        keyPass - password protecting the private key
        Returns:
        the private key from the specified key store
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException

      • readFromPemFormattedFile

        @Deprecated
public static byte[] readFromPemFormattedFile(java.io.File file)
                                       throws java.io.IOException,
                                              java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        Deprecated. (scheduled to be removed in 1.15) Use PemReader#readFirstSectionAndClose(java.io.Reader, String) instead.
        Reads a PEM formatted private key from a given file.

        This supports any file if and only if it contains a DER and Base64 encoded key, and the contents are enclosed by the following: 

        -----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----
-----END PRIVATE KEY-----

        The file may contain additional content outside of the BEGIN and END tags, but it will be ignored. This method does not support additional content such as headers inside the BEGIN and END tags. If the file contains multiple BEGIN and END tags, only the content inside the first pair will be read.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        Since:
        1.13

      • loadFromPkcs8PemFile

        @Deprecated
public static java.security.PrivateKey loadFromPkcs8PemFile(java.io.File pemFile)
                                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                                            java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        Deprecated. (scheduled to be removed in 1.15) Use PemReader#readFirstSectionAndClose(java.io.Reader, String) instead.
        Reads a PEM formatted PKCS8 encoded private key from a given file.

        This method uses readFromPemFormattedFile(java.io.File), and the file formatting requirements from that method apply.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        Since:
        1.13

      • loadFromP12File

        @Deprecated
public static java.security.PrivateKey loadFromP12File(java.io.File p12File,
                                                  java.lang.String storePass,
                                                  java.lang.String alias,
                                                  java.lang.String keyPass)
                                                throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException,
                                                       java.io.IOException
        Deprecated. (scheduled to be removed in 1.15) Use SecurityUtils#loadPrivateKeyFromKeyStore with SecurityUtils#getPkcs12KeyStore() instead
        Reads a PKCS#12 format private key from a given file.
        Parameters:
        p12File - p12 file
        storePass - password protecting the key store file
        alias - alias under which the private key is stored
        keyPass - password protecting the private key
        Returns:
        loaded private key
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        java.io.IOException
